Instructions: Raise a ticket using 'GC Oracle (Unity) User Set Up' or 'User Job Change' via My Connect.
Rationale: Ensures proper user credentials and security protocols for global regions.

Instructions: Raise a ticket using 'GC Oracle EBS Application Issues' via My Connect.
Rationale: Provides technical support for system-specific errors.

Instructions: 1. Select the dedicated line in error. 2. Press 'Get Cost'. 3. Refresh and press 'Book' to finalize.
Rationale: Resolves alerts where a line lacks a Buy Price Basis or Business Cost.

Instructions: If 'Get Cost' fails, contact the Buyer via Salesforce using the 'SO: WEB-SO*****, Part Num.:, Qty: **pcs' template.
Rationale: Required when no valid cost exists for the full order quantity; requires Marketing intervention.

Instructions: 1. Search order in Navision copy mailbox (Outlook). 2. Go to 'Line Item Details' in Unity and select the ship method and account number matching the confirmation.
Rationale: Ensures correct logistics and billing for customer-provided shipping accounts.

Instructions: 1. Click 'Book' to confirm the hold. 2. Send canned email 'CRERDITHOLD' to customer and CC the assigned collector.
Rationale: Prevents order booking for customers with finance/credit issues until cleared.

Instructions: Search using V90 warehouse code and 'Not released to warehouse'. Click '+' to see all components.
Rationale: Ensures visibility of all components in complex Build-to-Order items.

Instructions: Check 'Line Item Details' for workorder generation. Once build has started, items are NCNR (Non-Cancelable/Non-Returnable).
Rationale: Protects inventory costs for customized component builds.

Instructions: Ensure orders are received (booked) and expedited to destination within 24 hours.
Rationale: Maintains global shipping efficiency even when no alerts are present.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier using 'POSHORTSHIP'. 2. Amend QTY in Unity. 3. Inform customer using 'SHORTSHIP' and complete refund.
Rationale: Manages customer expectations and inventory accuracy for incomplete deliveries.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier of extra qty. 2. Create Stand-Alone PO to receive extra items. 3. Request RMA for over-shipment.
Rationale: Corrects system inventory when suppliers send more parts than ordered.

Instructions: 1. Send canned email to supplier and customer. 2. Cancel the order and complete refund. 3. Request RMA from supplier.
Rationale: Standardizes return and refund process for non-conforming goods.

Instructions: Check with warehouse if HAZMAT can be sent to ship-to address. If not, inform supplier/customer, cancel order, and refund.
Rationale: Ensures adherence to safety and transport regulations for hazardous materials.

Instructions: Raise IT ticket under 'Digital Issue' section with warehouse details. Delete backorder alerts after IT check.
Rationale: Generates a new Delivery ID (DID) if the warehouse management system fails.

Instructions: If stock available: Book order and select 'Do not send email'. If no stock: Follow stockout process.
Rationale: Controls customer notifications based on real-time stock availability in EMEA.

Instructions: 1. Send 'PARTIALA' email to customer. 2. If accepted, change quantity in both systems. If rejected, cancel and refund.
Rationale: Manages customer flexibility when orders cannot be fully fulfilled.

Instructions: Copy the value from 'Cost' field to 'Resale' field until the margin is 0.
Rationale: Ensures intercompany orders are processed with 0 margin per policy.

Instructions: If system doesn't auto-remove alerts in 24hrs, follow up with globalhtsclassification@arrow.com or tradecompliance.gc.emea@arrow.com.
Rationale: Clears legal holds preventing international shipping.

Instructions: If tracking is posted but QTY billed = 0, contact supplier for invoice info. Follow up in 1-2 days.
Rationale: Ensures final billing and closure of third-party drop-shipment orders.

Instructions: Verify stock with Asset Manager if VAL Date is not current. Ship date depends on parts reception.
Rationale: Initiates inventory replenishment for items listed as factory stock.

Instructions: Email delink_and_rematch_invoices@arrow.com with PO/SO details and reason for amendment.
Rationale: Required to amend orders that have already been billed.
